---
title: "Board Information"
---

E80 uses several custom-build circuit boards.  This page collects all of the design files for them in one place.  The CAD files for each board are viewable using [KiCAD](http://kicad.org/). 

* Motherboard (assembled in lab 1, used throughout) 
    * [schematic](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pk_mORYsxhedKjjqzhMrxj9H5ZVH3zqp/view?usp=sharing),

    * [KiCAD files](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pi9WNW7WoIx80xgb_0LWSUyA-LMfp94Z/view?usp=sharing)
    * [Introduction to the E80 Motherboard](https://drive.google.com/file/d/18bMajGNwH1K2yHB1dQLZRx5eqrYiNQWA/view?usp=sharing) document from lab 1.
    * [Motherboard Assembly Document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1v1vE3GXXUw8o6T2IJJws_xr_b3ntKiPx/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=105511935419108795487&rtpof=true&sd=true) from lab 1
